summary: Veterinary case management system with voice-to-text Quick Fill feature for extracting structured patient information
architectural_notes: Voice recording feature integrated with Quick Fill functionality
Structured data extraction from audio for veterinary case fields

existing_features.title: Add placeholder text inside the Quick Fill text box displaying the following field names as a guide: Medical Record number, Arrival Date, Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species, Breed, Sex, Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint

Implement automatic parsing of voice recording audio to extract structured veterinary case fields (Medical Record number, Arrival Date, Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species, Breed, Sex, Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint) from the transcribed text and populate the corresponding form fields in CaseFormDialog

Enhance the existing parseStructuredText function to recognize and extract the nine veterinary case fields (Medical Record number, Arrival Date, Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species, Breed, Sex, Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint) with improved pattern matching for voice-dictated text

new_feature_requests.summary: Add placeholder text guide with field names (Medical Record number, Arrival Date, Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species, Breed, Sex, Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint) in Quick Fill text box
Implement automatic audio parsing to extract structured veterinary case fields from voice recordings
